name: nbind
description: Magical headers that make your C++ library accessible from JavaScript

scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && tsc -p src/em && tsc -p src && cbuild -x -v -s dist/bundle/em-api.js -o dist/em-api.js
scripts.test-asm: autogypi -c test/autogypi.json && cd test/em && node-gyp configure build --asmjs=1 && tap ../test.js
scripts.test: autogypi -c test/autogypi.json && cd test/v8 && node-gyp configure build           && tap --gc ../test.js && tap --gc ../test-v8.js
